Class Boxboy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.xemiru.sponge.boxboy.Boxboy

  • public class Boxboy
extends Object
    The entrypoint class for Boxboy-related tasks.

      • createMenu

        public Menu createMenu(int rows,
                       Text title)
        Creates a new Menu using the Chest / Double Chest inventory archetype.

        There may be at most 6 rows.

        Parameters:
        rows - the row count to have for the inventory
        title - the title of the Menu
        Returns:
        the Menu instance

      • createMenu

        public Menu createMenu(InventoryArchetype arch,
                       Text title)
        Creates a new Menu using the provided inventory archetype.
        Parameters:
        arch - the archetype to use
        title - the title of the Menu
        Returns:
        the Menu instance

      • createExtendedMenu

        public ExtendedMenu createExtendedMenu(int rows,
                                       Text title)
        Creates a new ExtendedMenu using the Chest / Double Chest inventory archetype.

        There may be at most 6 rows.

        Parameters:
        rows - the row count to have for the inventory
        title - the title of the ExtendedMenu
        Returns:
        the ExtendedMenu instance
